Dialogue: You're trespassin' kid. You know where you're at?
Last week this foul stench and dirty water come outta nowhere, and now you!
Flake let you in? Damn that fly, constantly provokin' me!
He's always invitin' people a little too close to my turf.
That buzzin' bastard thinks he can do as he pleases.
One of these days I'm gonna squash him.
I'm already in a bad mood, now get out!
What you still doin' here kid!? I told you to get lost!
